name: Simple Refried Bean Dip
author: Ericuh
summary: Quick and easy refried bean dip ready in minutes.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles (such as RO*TEL®), drained
2 tablespoons shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
directions: Combine refried beans, pinto beans, diced tomatoes and green chiles, and salt in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave on high for 4 1/2 to 5 minutes
Remove from the microwave and stir until pinto beans are slightly mashed
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese on top and serve immediately
